steps.title: Note that rigging a locker is a quick way to get into your locker without having to put in your combination every time you go to your locker.
steps.content: Note that rigging a locker is a quick way to get into your locker without having to put in your combination every time you go to your locker. However, this process only works when you have a locker that has a lock built into it. As such, check to begin with that your locker has a built-in lock, not one that is removable.

steps.title: Hold the opener.
steps.content: Hold the opener. Once you have your locker open, be sure to hold up the lever and don't let go of it.

steps.title: Twist the combination lock to the left.
steps.content: Twist the combination lock to the left. Open it.

steps.title: Open the locker each time without dialing in the combo.
steps.content: Open the locker each time without dialing in the combo. Next time you need to use your locker, all you need to do is push up the lever. No need to put in your combination.

steps.title: Done.
steps.content: Done. Now your locker is rigged.

steps.title: To un-rig, open your locker.
steps.content: To un-rig, open your locker. Look behind the lock and you will find a black metal bar that is pushed up.

steps.title: Push that bar down.
steps.content: Push that bar down. Now you can close your locker. Spin the locker to the right about three times. The locker is now properly locked again.

steps.title: Hold up the lever.
steps.content: Hold up the lever. Once you have your locker open, be sure to hold up the lever.

steps.title: Find the metal bar.
steps.content: Find the metal bar. With the lever still pushed up, look inside. You'll see the metal bar directly behind the combination lock.

steps.title: Insert the pencil.
steps.content: Insert the pencil. Above the metal thing, there should be a piece of metal with a hole in it. Put a pencil in the hole. Use a pencil that you don't really need. Another student or staff member might find your locker rigged and take the pencil.

steps.title: Let go of the lever.
steps.content: Let go of the lever. Now your locker is rigged.

steps.title: Put in your combination but don't open.
steps.content: Put in your combination but don't open. You can also stop before putting in the last number. That way all you have to do is spin it to the last number, and open.

steps.title: Walk away.
steps.content: Walk away. When you come back all you have to do is open or add the last number and open it.
